Class CharacterApp

public class CharacterApp extends Object
Description: contains attributes and methods for managing JavaFX scenes for GUI

      method: initialDBConnect purpose: Using a server IP Address, username, password, and query, connect to the user's MySQL database and make updates
      Parameters:
      ip - is the IP Address of the MySQL server
      un - is the username for the MySQL server
      pw - is the password for the MySQL server
      Returns:
      true or false if the connection is successful or not

    • insertCharsToDB

      public static boolean insertCharsToDB(int id, String name, String classification, String race, int str, int dex, int con)
      method: insertCharstoDB purpose: Send insert query to database
      Parameters:
      id - Unique integer to ID Character
      name - Unique string to name Character
      classification - Describe Character skills
      race - Describe Character look and features
      str - Character's skill level in strength
      dex - Character's skill level in dexterity
      con - Chracter's skill level in constitution
      Returns:
      true or false if Character is inserted into database or not
